SELECT "composite_key" AS "cmpyKey" , "import_date" AS "imptDate" , "report_date" AS "reportDate" , "report_date_year" AS "year" , "report_date_month" AS "mont" , "report_date_day" AS "day" , "report_date_quarter" AS "qutr" , "org_name" AS "orgnFileName" , "org_file_path" AS "orgnFilePath" , "stg_file_name" AS "saveFileName" , "file_path" AS "saveFilePath" , "page_num" AS "pageNum" , "ta_score" AS "taScre" , "raw_data" AS "rawData" , "ext_data" AS "extData" , "ext_morphs" AS "extMorp" , "proper_noun" AS "propNoun" , "doc_category" AS "docCaty" FROM NLP."nlp_report"
limit 120

SELECT "report_date" AS "reportDate" , "org_name" AS "orgnFileName" , "org_file_path" AS "orgnFilePath" , round(cast(avg(ta_score) as numeric),4) AS "taScre" , string_agg(ext_morphs, ',') AS "extMorp" , string_agg(proper_noun, ',') AS "propNoun" , "doc_category" AS "docCaty" , "report_mdate" AS "reportMDate" FROM ( select report_date, org_name, org_file_path, ta_score, ext_morphs, proper_noun, doc_category, to_date(concat(report_date_year, '-', report_date_month, '-', report_date_day), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as report_mdate from nlp.nlp_report ) as innerTable where (proper_noun like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or org_name like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')) and report_mdate between to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by report_date, org_name, org_file_path, doc_category, report_mdate order by report_mdate desc limit 2000 offset 0
